query: SELECT a.carrier_serial_num csn, a.serial_num, c.step_name, c.carrier_serial_num, b.assy_serial_num, c.pass_fail, c.carrier_site FROM phase2.carrier_site a, phase2.trk_assembly b, phase2.lr4_shim_assembly c WHERE a.carrier_serial_num in('149096214') and c.state = 'C' and a.serial_num = b.serial_num and b.assy_serial_num = c.serial_num and b.assy_date = (select max(assy_date) from phase2.trk_assembly where serial_num = a.serial_num) Order by c.carrier_site
